title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a sister in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see a sister in a dream and the consequences of seeing an older and younger brother and knowing the interpretation of good and evil for a dream about a sister and the meaning of a sister in a dream for an unmarried and pregnant woman and her sister being beaten and killed, religion and trust are different, and the most beautiful things in life are sisters, they are a blessing, as they understand each other and grow with each other They play and laugh with each other, and the secrets and actions they share among themselves are the best interpretation of the dream of a sister. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a sister by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams about seeing a sister in a dream is a praiseworthy vision because it portends goodness and happiness for the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a sister in a dream indicates the fulfillment of aspirations. And the entry of joy and happiness into the life of the fortuneteller. Seeing the death of a sister in a dream means travel or separation from someone close to the dreamer. Seeing a sister’s illness in a dream means that the dreamer has many worries and pressures that disturb his life. Seeing a new sister in a dream indicates the coming of good and many Sustenance. Seeing a beautiful and good-looking little sister indicates the joy that prevails in the house and those inside it. Seeing a new sister in a dream indicates recent progress in something, such as a new baby or a new job. Interpretation of a dream about a sister for an unmarried girl. Interpretation of seeing a sister in A wedding dress in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates that she will get married soon. Seeing the death of a sister in a dream for an unmarried girl means that she has overcome the haters and envy of those around her. Interpretation of seeing the birth of a sister in a dream for an unmarried girl, it indicates grace, kindness, and livelihood. Seeing a sister while she is pregnant Dreaming of an unmarried girl shows him the problems and obstacles that the dreamer will face. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman’s sister: If a married woman sees that her sister is marrying her husband, this indicates many foods and blessings that her husband will receive. Seeing a pregnant sister in a dream for a married woman indicates that there are differences between her and Her husband. Seeing a newly married sister in a dream means that she will give birth to a new baby. Seeing a sister giving birth to a boy is an unpleasant vision and often portends sad news. Seeing the death of a sister in a dream for a married woman indicates disagreements with her husband, but soon these disagreements will end. Interpretation of a vision Pregnant sister: Seeing a sister giving birth to a girl in a dream for a pregnant woman means that she will be blessed with a girl. The interpretation of a sister in a dream for a pregnant woman as if she were hitting her sister in a dream indicates that her birth will be easy and smooth. The interpretation of a dream about a sister in a dream that a pregnant woman is giving birth to a boy indicates problems and difficulties in pregnancy, Also, giving birth was not easy. Interpretation of a dream about a man’s sister. Interpretation of a dream about a sister and a brother in a dream about a man indicates a lot of good luck and happiness. If a person dreams that he is marrying his sister, this indicates abundant sustenance and an increase in money. Interpretation of a dream about a sister in a dream and marriage, which indicates That the dreamer will get married if he is single. Interpretation of a sister seeing her sister. Seeing the dreamer that her sister is getting married while she is single means that she will get married soon and brings good news. Interpretation of a dream about a pregnant sister in a dream when she is single indicates the difficulties and problems that the dreamer will face. Visions

title: Dream interpretation of seeing breastfeeding in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing breastfeeding in a dream and seeing breastfeeding in a dream indicates goodness and abundance, because it indicates status and prestige. He explained in detail the dream of breastfeeding in a dream, the interpretation of the vision of breastfeeding. There is no doubt that breastfeeding is very important for the child, especially immediately after birth. The mother's breast, so all pediatricians advise breastfeeding only in the first six months of life, but the dream means that you see breastfeeding in a dream whether for a man or a woman, it means a dream about breastfeeding from a boy or a child. A girl in a dream, sees the mother’s breast, sees the mother breastfeeding in a dream, breastfeeding a child in a dream. Interpretation of the vision of breastfeeding by Ibn Sirin: The interpretation of the vision of breastfeeding from the mother’s breast is evidence of the goodness that he will attain in his life. The interpretation of the dream of breastfeeding a child in a dream has a good interpretation because seeing a mother Breastfeeding her child is a welcome idea. The interpretation of dreaming of breastfeeding a boy or girl in a dream directs the dreamer to obtain a position and a fair wife, and carrying the meaning of evil indicates harm and sadness. If a man sees that a woman’s breasts are beautiful, this is a sign of good fortune for him. The interpretation of the dream Breastfeeding a boy or girl in a dream at the age of weaning in a dream is evidence that a good dreamer is going to someone who does not deserve it. The interpretation of seeing a child being breastfed in a dream, as interpreted by Ibn Sirin, indicates the emergence of problems for me. And dreaming of breastfeeding and not being able to do so is evidence of not The responsibility of this mother who is breastfeeding her child. Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding from a mother: Whoever sees in his dream that his mother is breastfeeding him, then his vision is good news and abundance in life. Perhaps his vision indicates the presence of great status and power in the state or the promotion of currency. Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding a single woman: If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is breastfeeding a child, then her vision is good news for the husband who is busy with others. But if the visionary is busy, then her vision indicates her marriage, but if an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is breastfeeding her child from a man’s breast, then this vision is not desirable, which indicates On a serious illness. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman breastfeeding: Interpretation of a married woman breastfeeding in a dream If she sees that she is breastfeeding a child, then she sees that her promise is a good pregnancy. When a married woman interprets breastfeeding in a dream that she is breastfeeding someone or breastfeeding a child, her vision means that she will lose her daughter He dreamed of breastfeeding in a dream and saw him breastfeeding someone he knows, and the vision says that this man will confiscate his money despite this. Likewise, if a woman sees in her dream that her breasts are filled with milk and it will flow, then her vision indicates that she will acquire great wealth. Breastfeeding in a dream, in the woman’s interpretation For a woman who is breastfeeding that she is breastfeeding an older child, the vision shows anxiety and sadness. Seeing her in a dream that she is breastfeeding a married child, where she dreams that she is breastfeeding a man, then seeing her indicates extreme poverty. Dreaming about breastfeeding In a married woman’s dream and seeing that she is breastfeeding a child, then seeing it indicates That insight is lonely and must be taken care of by others. Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding a pregnant woman: Breastfeeding in a dream, if a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is breastfeeding

title: What is the interpretation of seeing childbirth in a dream in full for a woman and a man?

preview.html: The Trend website gives you an explanation of how to dream about giving birth. Birth is part of our life and our origin in this world, and it is one of the greatest blessings that God has bestowed upon all of humanity. Therefore, the symbol of childbirth in a dream is the entire subject of many people in the depths of their dreams, and for this reason we have collected for you, our followers, everything related to the interpretation of childbirth in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, Ibn Sirin, and other scholars in the interpretation of pregnant dreams and visions and their meaning, as well as seeing childbirth in a dream. Complete for public and married women, even for men’s dreams. Childbirth in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqThe interpretation of childbirth in a dream is complete from the visions mentioned by Imam Al-Sadiq. In addition, seeing the birth of twins and more than one child in a complete dream is a good reason for the dreamer that he will obtain a precious livelihood, and it can That this will be wealth, inheritance, and the fulfillment of many desires. In addition, if one sees in a dream that his wife is giving birth to a new baby, this is evidence to him of the great blessing that God will bestow upon the dreamer in his next life. A man seeing his wife carrying a child indicates that God He will give him a male child to help and support him in his earthly life. A new baby in a dream, Kamil, is a sign of profit, livelihood, achievement of goals, success, and success in what the fortuneteller deviates from. Kamil ibn Sirin gives birth in a dream. The great scholar Ibn Sirin explained to us that a man’s vision of a non-pregnant woman who became pregnant and gave birth to a child is a treasure. Dreams. Seeing childbirth in a dream is one of the visions that indicate that the dreamer will recover from an illness and will enjoy good physical health for him in the near future. Also, complete childbirth in a dream is evidence of favorable changes for the dreamer in the later life of him and his family as a whole. The interpretation of seeing someone Giving birth in a full dream indicates that the dreamer will help that person in certain aspects of his life to lead them to safety. Giving birth to a full woman who is not pregnant in a dream is a source of support, kindness, joyful changes awaiting the woman and a sign that she has heard good news. Dream of a woman giving birth in generalInterpretation of seeing the birth of a child for a woman Complete in a dream is good news that she will hear good news and enter into a life full of joy and pleasures. Giving birth to a child in a dream of a single woman is a vision that had evidence that her problems will soon be solved and she will emerge from a state of fatigue, sadness, and depression. Seeing a girl giving birth in a dream, almost never says Complete that she will go through a difficult emotional experience full of difficult events. In addition, the dream of giving birth to a sick and disabled child suggests that she will marry a man who is inappropriate and corrupt in her life and religion. Childbirth in a dream is complete for a married woman. The interpretation of a married woman’s beliefs that she gave birth to a man indicates to her that he will be There are better changes in her life and a way out of the problems she is facing. Also, to see the full birth of a girl for a married woman in a dream, says that in the next few days she will have to experience happy and joyful events. A difficult birth in a full dream indicates for a married woman with children in the

title: Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream in different colors

preview.html: The encyclopedia provides an interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream, which is one of the visions that arouse doubt and anxiety in the soul, as the snake symbolizes hatred, cunning and evil in people. It has many names that are called it, such as the snake and the serpent as well, and it lives in deserts and rural areas as well as in seas and canals, and since the snake has this bad psychological effect on a person in a state of wakefulness, how is it? When you see it in a dream, we explain through this article the different interpretations of seeing a living in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream The different interpretations of seeing a snake in a dream according to the scholar Ibn Sirin: The snake in a dream symbolizes the enemy, and the larger its size, the stronger and more evil the enemy is. Whoever kills a snake in a dream has defeated his enemy, and whoever bites it, his enemy defeats him, and the dreamer cannot harm him. Eating snake meat in a dream means gaining money and status from the enemy and victory over him. The white snake symbolizes the difficulty of enemies, while the black snake shows the seriousness of their cunning. A small snake in a dream indicates the birth of a male. Killing a snake in bed means the death of the wife, and whoever cuts it while it is wrapped around his neck divorces her, and God knows best. Whoever sees in his dream a snake wandering around his house, entering and then leaving without harming him, his enemy is from his family. Snake in a dream for a single woman The snake in the dream of an unmarried woman has different meanings that we will show in detail in the following points: The snake in a single dream symbolizes malicious people who They envy them and expect and desire to destroy what God has given them. Killing a single beard in a dream indicates the final disposition of those people who hide evil in their souls. Seeing a white beard in a dream means marriage and childbirth. Seeing an unmarried woman as a white snake in a dream indicates her desire to marry. Interpretation of a dream about a snake for a pregnant woman Ibn Sirin says in the interpretation of a pregnant woman if she sees a snake in a dream: The snake in a pregnant woman's dream symbolizes the fact that the fetus is male. The white snake shows family stability and the ease of the birth process. Seeing a pregnant snake chasing her in a dream means that there are people in her life who hate her and wish her harm. Interpretation of a dream about a snake in its colors The meanings of seeing a snake in a dream differ according to its color as follows: Black snake It is the worst kind of dream, because it symbolizes the worst enemies of human life, and sometimes it means Satan. White snake: It refers to the wife and children, and there is often enmity and disagreement between the dreamer and each other, and it may symbolize a spiteful woman, whether she is a wife or a friend. Green snake This indicates the dreamer's preoccupation with pleasures Worldliness and his shortcomings in obeying God and thinking about the future, as it indicates the approach of rain and the green snake in bed, good news for a male child. Yellow snake: symbolizes hatred, malice and envy, as it indicates the desire of enemies to harm the seer, in addition to sometimes indicating a serious illness. Interpretation of seeing a large snake in a dream Seeing a large snake indicates the presence of a strong and cruel enemy in the seer’s life, who may

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a big house for a married woman?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a large and spacious house for a married woman is one of the visions that most women see because of their future ambitions and constant thinking about building a house for their children to ensure a decent life for them, and some of them are in a hurry to find out its correct interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about a large and spacious house for married women carries the interpretation of a dream about a large and spacious house for a married woman, according to opinions Interpreters, a sign of complete contentment and contentment with life with her husband, even if it is difficult. A woman’s dream of a large and spacious house also leads to ample livelihood and the achievement of a certain goal after a long wait for her and her partner. The dreamer’s vision of a large and spacious house may indicate a strong longing And nostalgia for the past before marriage, if it was old. Which has a website. Interpretation of dreams online from Google. There are many interpretations and questions about followers that you can see. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream of a large and spacious house for a married woman. The respected scholar Ibn Sirin sees that a large and spacious house is for a woman A married woman in a dream means wealth and the abundance of goodness and grace that she enjoys and enjoys. A dream of a large and spacious house for a married woman indicates getting rid of the worries and difficulties that hinder the course of her life during this period. A woman entering a large and spacious house in her dream indicates pregnancy with good offspring, whether it is Children or grandchildren. Ibn Sirin showed that a large, spacious house for a married woman indicates a change in circumstances for the better, and if she is sick, the time for her recovery will be soon. Interpretation of a dream about a large, spacious house for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about a large, spacious house for a pregnant woman indicates that the fetus inside her womb is male, and in If the dreamer is in the last months of pregnancy, this indicates the ease of giving birth to a child while she is pregnant. The child will be healthy, and her life will be full of that period and the good luck she enjoys with her husband. Interpretation of a dream about a new, big, big house for a married womanCommentators say that if one sees the large and spacious house in a married woman’s dream, this indicates that she wants to give up a sin and repent to God And he asked for contentment and forgiveness from him. Some jurists believe that if the dreamer sees a wide and spacious house, this is a sign that she will give birth to a new baby, and the dream interpretation of the spacious house and living in it could be a sign of her husband obtaining a new home. Business opportunity. Interpretation of a dream about a large, old house for a married woman: A dream about a large, spacious, and old house for a married woman shows that there is a close relationship with her husband and children and she is afraid of anything for them. The dreamer’s vision of entering a large, spacious, but old house indicates that she is happy with a stable life with her husband, and they are bound by bonds of love and affection with each other. The dreamer’s vision of a large, spacious house built of old black clay, shows the extent of tenderness and peace inside it, and that he loves kindness to others and does not He holds a grudge against someone.Interpretation of a dream about building a large and spacious house for a married woman.Interpretation of a dream for a married woman who was building a large and spacious house in...

Some jurists believe that if the dreamer sees a wide and spacious house, this is a sign that she will give birth to a new baby, and the dream interpretation of the spacious house and living in it could be a sign of her husband obtaining a new home. Business opportunity. Interpretation of a dream about a large, old house for a married woman: A dream about a large, spacious, and old house for a married woman shows that there is a close relationship with her husband and children and she is afraid of anything for them. The dreamer’s vision of entering a large, spacious, but old house indicates that she is happy with a stable life with her husband, and they are bound by bonds of love and affection with each other. The dreamer’s vision of a large, spacious house built of old black clay, shows the extent of tenderness and peace inside it, and that he loves kindness to others and does not He holds a grudge against someone.Interpretation of a dream about building a large and spacious house for a married woman.Interpretation of a dream for a married woman who was building a large and spacious house in...

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about marrying an ex-girlfriend in a dream. Seeing a dream can express good or bad, so in the following lines we learn about the dream interpretation of marrying an ex-boyfriend in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about marrying an ex-girlfriend in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about marrying an ex-girlfriend in a dream may It indicates that you are thinking about your lover, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. The vision of a single young man marrying his ex-girlfriend may indicate his inability to give up her love, and God knows best what he does not see. If an unmarried girl dreams of marrying her former lover, this may indicate that she is not free from Memories of her love for her lover, and God knows the unseen. It can also lead to thinking about the past and the inability to think about the future, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of not marrying a lover in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of not marrying a lover in a dream. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that her parents refuse to marry her lover, this may be a sign of problems and conflict with the family. When you see your parents refusing to marry your lover in a dream, this may be a sign of family problems, and God is Most High. title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing a pen in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a pen in a dream The pen is an essential tool used in writing and can be seen in a dream with hundreds of different interpretations, due to its different type, and it can be made of metal, whether silver, gold, plastic or wood. It also has many colors such as red, blue, yellow and others, which is why we find many indications, some of which are positive and some negative. It varies from one opinion to another. If you are interested in searching for an interpretation of seeing a pen in a dream, you can read this article. Seeing a pen in a dream The pen is one of the tools that we use in our lives on a daily basis and it was mentioned in the Holy Qur’an. It is a tool that has existed since ancient times and was later developed. What about the interpretation of seeing a pen in a dream? Sheikh Al-Nabulsi: Seeing a pen in a student's dream symbolizes an abundance of knowledge and a high position in the future. Anyone who sees a judge holding a pen in a dream, this may indicate that he will be imprisoned and imprisoned. If you see a pen in a dream, this may indicate travel. The pen in a merchant's dream promises the prosperity of trade conditions, the expansion of his business, and the fruits of many profits. Seeing a pen in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin mentioned in his interpretation of seeing a pen in a dream several different meanings, some positive and others negative: Ibn Sirin believes that the interpretation of seeing a pen in a dream indicates strength, authority, and holding an important position. The ink of the pen in a man's dream indicates many offspring and righteous offspring. Whoever sees that he is writing with a pen in his dream is a person who has fulfilled his promise. Writing with a pen in a dream is a sign of an abundance of knowledge. Seeing a bachelor's pen is a sign that you are working in a prestigious job. Ibn Sirin says that whoever sees in a dream someone stabbing him with a pen is a sign of an enemy who is lurking around him, planning a plot, and waiting for the right opportunity to betray him. The symbol of the pen in a dream Al-Osaimi Al-Osaimi offers several different interpretations of the symbol depending on the type of pen: Al-Osaimi for a pencil in a dream symbolizes a high position in professional life. Al-Osaimi says that whoever sees in a dream that he is sharpening a pencil on a sharpener, this is evidence of the disappearance of worries and problems and the arrival of comfort. The pen in a man’s dream is a symbol of wisdom and intelligence in managing his business affairs. Interpretation of a dream about a blue pen for unmarried women symbolizes an upcoming marriage. Dropping a pen in a dream can mean a great financial loss. Seeing a pen in a dream for a single woman What are the interpretations of seeing a pen in a single dream? The pen in an unmarried person’s dream is a symbol of a close marriage. Seeing a girl writing the Holy Qur’an with a pen in a dream is commendable and indicates purity, chastity, uprightness of religion, and the strength of her faith. But if the dreamer sees that she was writing with a red pen in her dream, a secret that she was hiding from everyone and was afraid to reveal may be revealed. The interpretation of a dream about a blue pen for an engaged girl can indicate emotional failure, loneliness, and emptiness after distance and abandonment. Buying a blue pen in a dream for a single woman Does buying a blue pen in a person’s dream mean good or Bad? To know the answer to this question, you can see the following explanations.

title: Interpretation of seeing cats in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing cats in a dream, seeing cats in a dream, meanings of a cat in a dream, what is the interpretation of seeing cats in a dream for single people, married people, pregnant women and men, the symbol of a cat in a dream, interpretation of seeing cats in a dream by Ibn Sirin Cats are growing pets. Details of the vision as well. Names of cats. Seeing cats in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing cats in a dream and feeling terror and fear for them indicates the dreamer’s fears about entering a new phase of his life in which he must make serious decisions about his future. Seeing cats in a dream indicates the livelihood of a good husband with some fear. From the experience of being single. Seeing cats in a dream for a pregnant woman remembers her stress and tension from pregnancy and childbirth. Seeing cats and being afraid of them in a dream indicates that the viewer is exposed to hatred, jealousy, and malice from those close to him. Seeing a cat in a dream indicates cunning, deception, and scheming on the part of someone close to the fortune-teller. Seeing a cat in a dream indicates that The dream showed good and good news. Seeing a hungry cat in a dream indicates that the dreamer needs money, but he cannot find it and cannot get it. Seeing a cat in a dream indicates money, wealth, superiority and success. Interpretation of seeing cats in a dream for a single woman. Seeing cats in a dream for an unmarried woman and they were many in number. It indicates many crises and problems in her life. Seeing a cat in a dream for a single woman shows that she gets a new job. Seeing a single woman fighting with many cats in a dream is a cue to the deception, cunning and conspiracy of her friends. Seeing a lot of cats in a dream it heralds good news. Seeing a male cat in a dream A single woman shows that she knows a deceitful man and that he will harm her, and she should be careful and stay away from him. Seeing cats in a dream for a single woman indicates deception and betrayal by those close to her. Interpretation of seeing cats in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman in a dream about cats indicates instability in her marital life as a result of many Of conflicts. Seeing a married woman feeding cats in a dream indicates her good and psychological well-being. Seeing a married woman fighting a cat in a dream indicates the emergence of many conflicts and problems in her life. Seeing cats chasing a woman and trying to catch her in a dream says that she suffers from hatred and jealousy from those around her. Seeing A married cat with an ugly face in a dream announces the loss of her married life. Interpretation of seeing a pregnant cat in a dream. Seeing pregnant cats in a dream indicates the safety and good health of her fetus. Seeing a pregnant cat in a dream, and the cat was male. The vision indicated that she gave birth to a boy. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream is a beautiful white sheet of paper. That she will give birth to a baby girl and she will be very beautiful and good. Interpretation of seeing cats in a dream for a man: A man sees cats attacking him and pushes them away. It shows that he has overcome many crises and adversities that he faces in his life. Seeing cats scratching a man in a dream indicates that the dreamer is exposed to loss and damage from the enemy. Seeing a cat In a dream for a man, it indicates the presence of a disreputable woman in his life. Seeing a cat in the distance

title: What do you know about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a famous person in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a famous person in a dream by senior scholars: There are many famous figures in our society, and their professions are singers, actors, media figures, religious scholars, and other celebrities. Ibn Sirin was able to correctly interpret the appearance of a famous person in a dream. Through the specialized Egyptian website, you will see the largest number of interpretations of the appearance of a famous person in a dream through observation. Interpretation of a dream of a famous person in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a famous person in a dream indicates success and sustenance if this person works in the field of art in general, whether he is an actor or a singer. If the dreamer dreams that he has become a well-known person and occupies a high position in the state, then this is a sign that his position will soon rise in his family and all his acquaintances. There are several conditions that govern the interpretation of this vision, and they are as follows: The appearance of the famous person in the vision: There is no doubt that the clothes of this person In the vision, the interpretation is very different, and the more beautiful the appearance and fragrant smell, the more wonderful the vision is, and the colors worn in the vision have countless interpretations: Black color, and what is meant by this is either the dreamer’s dignity and status, or the sadness and pain that will befall him. The color is white and green, among the benign colors. In dreams, their meanings are full of hope, as they indicate many joys, good things, and conditions of comfort. Even if he wears clothes in pink or blue, it will be better than dark blue. And if we talk about his facial expressions in the dream, his interpretation will be either praiseworthy or hateful according to, and if he appears laughing, it will be The symbol of the vision is joyful and means good news. His behavior and behavior among men while he is awake: If this famous person is one of the people with a good biography and high morals, then this is a sign of improving the dreamer’s status in his worldly life, but if this person is known to be immoral and always engages in behavior Shameful, the vision is bad and implies ruin and devastation in the dreamer's life. Speech directed at the dreamer from this person in the vision: Good words - those with auspicious meanings are better interpreted than annoying words - carrying meanings of blame and accusation or warning and warning. The former means that the dreamer will soon be reassured and all will be removed. Things that caused him fear and his life will be fine, perhaps the vision literally refers to what the dreamer heard in his dream. Meaning that if he meets a famous person, and tells him that he will succeed in an approaching project, the dreamer may actually achieve the deal he wants to achieve. But we must keep in mind a dangerous secret, which is that the distinction between self-narrations and real visions is very important, perhaps this vision is just dreams that he bears witness to. In which he achieves the things he wants and desires, and so the commentators said. That the dreamer is allowed to see all hours of the day in which the vision is only at twilight time, what the dreamer sees at that time will fall into the dream pipes. What is the interpretation of seeing a famous figure in a dream by Ibn Sirin? If the person whom the dreamer saw in his dream is a famous football player He has a large audience, so this is an indication that the dreamer is doing business

His behavior and behavior among men while he is awake: If this famous person is one of the people with a good biography and high morals, then this is a sign of improving the dreamer’s status in his worldly life, but if this person is known to be immoral and always engages in behavior Shameful, the vision is bad and implies ruin and devastation in the dreamer's life. Speech directed at the dreamer from this person in the vision: Good words - those with auspicious meanings are better interpreted than annoying words - carrying meanings of blame and accusation or warning and warning. The former means that the dreamer will soon be reassured and all will be removed. Things that caused him fear and his life will be fine, perhaps the vision literally refers to what the dreamer heard in his dream. Meaning that if he meets a famous person, and tells him that he will succeed in an approaching project, the dreamer may actually achieve the deal he wants to achieve. But we must keep in mind a dangerous secret, which is that the distinction between self-narrations and real visions is very important, perhaps this vision is just dreams that he bears witness to. In which he achieves the things he wants and desires, and so the commentators said. That the dreamer is allowed to see all hours of the day in which the vision is only at twilight time, what the dreamer sees at that time will fall into the dream pipes. What is the interpretation of seeing a famous figure in a dream by Ibn Sirin? If the person whom the dreamer saw in his dream is a famous football player He has a large audience, so this is an indication that the dreamer is doing business
